extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2024-20307 or CVE-2024-20308 by reviewing the installed version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2024-20307 or CVE-2024-20308?
Is updating to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to the Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected product to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerabilities CVE-2024-20307 and CVE-2024-20308.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Cisco Workarounds
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the workarounds provided by Cisco for CVE-2024-20307 and CVE-2024-20308 as an alternative mitigation measure.
